price: 你们不要以廉价出卖安拉的盟约；在安拉那里的，对于你们是更好的，如果你们知道。
arabic: وَلَا تَشۡتَرُواْ بِعَهۡدِ ٱللَّهِ ثَمَنٗا قَلِيلًاۚ إِنَّمَا عِندَ ٱللَّهِ هُوَ خَيۡرٞ لَّكُمۡ إِن كُنتُمۡ تَعۡلَمُونَ

version.title: Chinese Translation - Muhammad Makin
version.description: Translation of the Quran meanings into Chinese by Muhammad Makin. Corrected by supervision of Rowwad Translation Center. The original translation is available for suggestions, continuous evaluation and development.

meta.transliteration: walā tashtarū biʿahdi al-lahi thamanan qalīlan innamā ʿinda al-lahi huwa khayrun lakum in kuntum taʿlamūna
